tutorials.title: How can I generate an alert for suspicious access to sensitive data from specific IPs using Logging Analytics?
tutorials.description: This lab explains how to create multi-conditional labels, and OOTB Threat score enrichment.

tutorials.title: Related Sprint: How to create and trigger an ingest time detection rule?
tutorials.description: Explains how to create a ingest time detection rule and trigger it.

tutorials.title: Related Sprint: How to create alerts on logs with Logging Analytics?
tutorials.description: Explains how to create OCI Alarms and verify it.

tutorials.title: Related Sprint: How to upload Files into a Source from the OCI console?
tutorials.description: Explains how to upload logs file using OCI console.
